snippet: Cuba denied assertions that Alan Gross’s health was deteriorating and that he might have cancer.
abstract: Cuba reacts angrily to United Nations ruling that its imprisonment of American contractor Alan Gross was arbitrary, and it denies assertions that Gross's health is deteriorating and that he might have cancer.
lead_paragraph: Cuba denied assertions that Alan Gross’s health was deteriorating and that he might have cancer.

headline.main: Cuban Officials Attack U.N. Ruling on Imprisonment of American
headline.print_headline: Cuba: Officials Attack U.N. Ruling On Imprisonment of American
